name.name: Image Segmentation Based on the Local Center of Mass Computation

software.description: This is a Matlab toolbox for medical image segmentation, which uses an approach based on the local center of mass, as introduced by Aganj et al (Sci Rep, 2018). A short tutorial is included in EXAMPLE.m. If available, a GPU can be used to speed up the segmentation.
software.maintainer: Harvard Medical School / Massachusetts General Hospital
